name: Prestige
description:
click to enlarge screen is better to play !!

Hello, Prestige is a 3d puzzle game for Ludum Dare's game jam, which you have to get out of this crazy hotel by solving puzzles in the rooms. We hope you like it!

This is team Atlas !! 

3D Modeler and Design LaisCahill

Programmer and Design Tedbuke
